name: element: app :computer:
description: Problem or suggestion is associated with an Archiv8 application

name: element: com :family:
description: Problem is associated with the community

name: element: doc :ledger:
description: Problem or suggestion is associated with the documentation

name: element: form :scroll:
description: Issue or suggestion is associated with a form

name: element: other :question:
description: Problem or suggestion  is associated with something not covered elsewhere

name: element: package :gift:
description: Problem or improvement is associated with a package

name: element: src :speedboat:
description: Problem may be associated with the upstream source code source code

name: err: dupe :loop:
description: Issue or pull request already exists

name: priority: CRITICAL :clock1:
description: Issue needs addressing as soon as possible

name: priority: NORMAL :calendar:
description: Issue can wait but needs addressing before those marked as URGENT and CRITICAL

name: status: old :face_exhaling:
description: This issue is old. What should happen next?

name: status: stale :ghost:
description: This issue is stale. It has been overtaken by other code changes. What should happen next?

name: status: outdated :satellite:
description: Package is not in sync with the latest upstream release

name: type: outdated :placard:
description: Package is not in sync with the latest upstream release

name: wait: need help :loudspeaker:
description: Help is needed to fix the issue

name: wait: review :eyeglasses:
description: Help is needed to fix the issue

name: wait: test :syringe:
description: The fix for this issue is waiting to be reviewed

name: wait: triage :hospital:
description: This issue is waiting to be triaged
